Text: LATAM Airlines Paraguay, formerly known as TAM Paraguay or Transportes Aéreos del Mercosur S.A., and previously as LAP (Líneas Aéreas Paraguayas), is the flag carrier and the national airline of Paraguay with its headquarters in Asunción, Paraguay.
Triplets:<LATAM Airlines Paraguay
1:
--------------------
Text: LATAM Paraguay:  Its flights operate from Silvio Pettirossi International Airport in Asunción.
Triplets:<LATAM Paraguay
2:
--------------------
<Text: LATAM Paraguay:  Its parent company is LATAM Airlines Group.>
